title: [SysPipeliners] Build Up Infrastructure for new FIB tools microservices (basic) PI 24.4
description:
Description
As aligned during the SNP PIP 24.4 between Team Vega & Sys. Architect & Systeam Pipeliners we need to support FIB tool development with Setup of CaaS and CI/CD infrastructure for FIB microservice:
Tasks
Order PostgreSQL DbaaS (nonprod cluster) and handover to Developers
Order separate nonprod CaaS project in t03 (Decision by Architect Carsten Jupitz to keep the FIB Tool separate from the other MS)
Build up CaaS infrastructure for FIB Microservice (Dev & EAT)
extend namespace resource quotas
Order firewall clearances if needed
Create additional network policies if needed
implement dynatrace integration (and EaaS if requested)
Create and adapt helm chart for FIB
Integration to panda-deploy repository for unified deployment 
Align with Vega Team on specifics (implement yet unknown requirements/configurations)
Feedback from Vega Team that everything is working as intended.
  Milestones:
The new "FIB Tool basic micoservice infrastructure" for the Panda DEV and EAT environments need to be ready to start with the development and integration with Panda by 2. Iteration for the  Dev. team Vega.
  The new "FIB Tool basic micoservice infrastructure" for the Panda UAT and PROD Environments are needed in the next PI 25.1 (later)
We need to align therefore within the next Pre-PIP phase and finialize it during the next PIP 25.1.

Business Scope:
Support FIB tool development with Setup of CaaS and CI/CD infrastructure for FIB microservice.
acceptance_criteria: CaaS infrastructure (dev & EAT environment) has been prepared for FIB MS (firewall, resource quotas, Network policies etc, Dynatrace integration)
Helm chart for FIB has been created and is fully functional
Deployment via panda-deploy repository is integrated
Feedback from Vega Team that everything is working as intended.
